import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import{FormGroup,FormBuilder} from '@angular/forms' @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.css'] }) export class SignupComponent { public signupForm!: FormGroup; constructor(private formBuilder : FormBuilder){ } ngOnInit():void { this.signupForm = this.formBuilder.group({ fullname:[''], email:[''], mobile:[''], password:[''] }) } }
